LanguageData.VQE_DeadlifeQuestChain.description: This quest will let you crack open and loot several underground silos left by an ancient civilization. As you scavenge the dark, ominous corridors, youâ€™re bound to find out who [General_FullName] was and what was the purpose of the Operation: Deadlife.\n\nIt is rumoured that [General_FullName] may have The Platinum Chip.
